blackjackplayground

Class CoinPurse

  • java.lang.Object
    • blackjackplayground.CoinPurse
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.util.EventListener, javax.swing.event.ChangeListener

    public class CoinPurse
extends java.lang.Object
implements javax.swing.event.ChangeListener
    CoinPurse stores information about the amount of money the player can use in the game.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      CoinPurse()
      Creates new CoinPurse object with 1000€ wealth;
      CoinPurse(int m)
      Creates new CoinPurse object with selected amount of wealth.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addMoney(int m)
      Adds the specified amount of money to the CoinPurse object If given negative amount, adds nothing
      int bet()
      Makes a bet for the selected sum and returns the amount bet.
      boolean betAcceptable()
      Checks if the CoinPurse object has enough money to bet the sum selected by player
      int getMoney()
      Amount of money in the CoinPurse
      void setWealth(int m)
      Sets the current wealth in the CoinPurse to given amount if given less than 10, keeps the current amount
      void stateChanged(javax.swing.event.ChangeEvent e) 

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • CoinPurse

        public CoinPurse()
        Creates new CoinPurse object with 1000€ wealth;

      • CoinPurse

        public CoinPurse(int m)
        Creates new CoinPurse object with selected amount of wealth. If given less than zero, creates object with 1000€ wealth
        Parameters:
        m -

    • Method Detail

      • betAcceptable

        public boolean betAcceptable()
        Checks if the CoinPurse object has enough money to bet the sum selected by player
        Returns:
        true if there is enough money, else false

      • bet

        public int bet()
        Makes a bet for the selected sum and returns the amount bet. If there is not enough money in CoinPurse object, returns zero
        Returns:
        Amount of money bet

      • getMoney

        public int getMoney()
        Amount of money in the CoinPurse
        Returns:
        Amount of money in the CoinPurse

      • addMoney

        public void addMoney(int m)
        Adds the specified amount of money to the CoinPurse object If given negative amount, adds nothing
        Parameters:
        m - Amount of money to be added

      • setWealth

        public void setWealth(int m)
        Sets the current wealth in the CoinPurse to given amount if given less than 10, keeps the current amount
        Parameters:
        m - Amount of money to be set as wealth

      • stateChanged

        public void stateChanged(javax.swing.event.ChangeEvent e)
        Specified by:
        stateChanged in interface javax.swing.event.ChangeListener
